comments.author: Cliff Spradlin.3512
comments.body:
Seiishizo.7162:

They are down again :S

Looks up to me. Is anyone else seeing any problems?

comments.author: Cliff Spradlin.3512
comments.body:
Hi,

The WvW API is now fixed and should be fully re-populated shortly.

Sorry for the extended downtime, we should have caught it earlier. Thanks for the reports.

comments.author: Michaels.5231
comments.body:
Thanks for posting this. At first I thought it was just my application and I was freaking out. At least now I know it is the WvW API in general.

Now on to handling this error, just in case!
(WvW API still down at time of this posting).

comments.author: Drakma.1549
comments.body: As of this post the WvW APIs have been down for over 2.5 hours. Was this planned and I missed a post or is this something serious?
